description: No matter what time of year it is, there's always a good reason to get together with friends. A nice concoction that you can whip up in minutes is the Tequila Highball cocktail. Not only does this drink taste great, but it’s also pretty simple to make!
name: Tequila Highball

recipeInstructions.name: Fill a highball glass with ice.
recipeInstructions.text: Fill a highball glass with ice.

recipeInstructions.name: Pour tequila, lime juice, and sparkling water into the glass. Stir gently.
recipeInstructions.text: Pour tequila, lime juice, and sparkling water into the glass. Stir gently.

recipeInstructions.name: Garnish your cocktail with a wedge of fresh lime before serving!
recipeInstructions.text: Garnish your cocktail with a wedge of fresh lime before serving!
